contextId.information: The voice was so loud it sounded like a trumpet. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
His eyes are describes as being full of light like a flame of fire. AT: "his eyes were glowing like a flame of fire" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: his eyes were like a flame of fire

contextId.information: Jesus will come at a time when people do not expect him, just as a thief comes when not expected. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: I will come as a thief

contextId.information: Sometimes sackcloth was made of black hair. People would wear sackcloth when they were mourning. The image of sackcloth is meant to lead people to think of death and mourning. AT: "as black as mourning clothes" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
"just as unripened fruit easily falls in great quantities from a fig tree when a strong wind shakes it" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: just as a fig tree drops its unripe fruit when shaken by a stormy wind

contextId.information: The sky was normally thought of as being strong like a sheet of metal, but now it was weak like a sheet of paper and easily torn and rolled up. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: The sky vanished like a scroll that was being rolled up

contextId.information: Possible meanings are it 1) "became red like blood"  or it 2) really became blood. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
A huge furnace gives off a great amount  of thick, dark smoke. AT: "like the great amount of smoke that comes from a huge furnace" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: like smoke from a huge furnace

contextId.information: "It will taste as sweet as honey" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: it will be as sweet as honey

contextId.information: The water flowed from his mouth like a river flows. AT: "in large volume" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
Harsh speech is spoken of as if it were the roar of a dragon. AT: "it spoke harshly like a dragon speaks" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
She claims to be a ruler, having her own authority. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: I am seated as a queen

contextId.information: John speaks of what he is hearing as if it were like the sound made by a very large crowd of people, a large body of rushing water, and very loud thunder. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: Then I heard what sounded like the voice of a great number of people, like the roar of many waters, and like loud crashes of thunder

contextId.information: This compares the new Jerusalem to a bride, who makes herself beautiful for her bridegroom. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: like a bride adorned for her husband

contextId.information: The gold was so clear that it is spoken of as if it was glass. See how you translated a similar phrase in [[:en:bible:notes:rev:21:18|21:18]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
